#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int q;
    cin>>q;
    while(q!=0)
    {long long int x;
    cin>>x;long long int s=0,a=1,b=2;
    long long int y=0;
    if(x==0 || x==1 || x==2)
       cout<<"YES"<<endl;
       else
    for(int i=0;i<70;i++)
      if(y>x)
        {cout<<"NO"<<endl;break;}
        else if(y==x)
           {cout<<"YES"<<endl;break;}
           else
           {y=s+a+b;s=a;a=b;b=y;}
        q--;
    }return 0;
}
